passive.name: All-In
passive.description: Increases the wearer's DEF by <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong>. When the wearer provides a Shield to an ally, the wearer's CRIT DMG increases by <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong>, lasting for {{3}} turn(s). When the wearer's follow-up attack hits an enemy target, there is a <orangeStrong>{{4}}%</orangeStrong> base chance to increase the DMG taken by the attacked enemy target by <orangeStrong>{{5}}%</orangeStrong>, lasting for {{6}} turn(s).
